subject: Automobile Racing
Robberies and Thefts
Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The police recovered a stolen racecar on a rural roadside north of Atlanta a day after it was taken from a stock car team’s hotel parking lot.
snippet: The police recovered a stolen racecar on a rural roadside north of Atlanta a day after it was taken from a stock car team’s hotel parking lot.
